text.autoconfig.wayfix.title: WayFix Options
text.autoconfig.wayfix.option.autoScaleG: Auto-scales the GUI scale depending on your display's scaling. (e.g. 2 GUI Scale on 1920x1080 at 100% -> 4 GUI Scale on 3840x2160 at 200%)
text.autoconfig.wayfix.option.injectIcon: Injects the Minecraft Icon at Startup instead of defaulting to the normal Wayland icon (requires restart).
text.autoconfig.wayfix.option.keyModifie: Fixes keyboard combinations such as 'CTRL + A' or 'CTRL + C' being sent in chat.
text.autoconfig.wayfix.option.fullscreen: Options related to full-screening the game (Wayland breaks the default Minecraft Fullscreen functionality a little bit)
Full-screens the window in the selected monitor (view list below!!!!).
Full-screens the window in the selected monitor (view list below!!!!). (by default Minecraft sometimes full-screens on the wrong monitor due to Wayland limitations)
